data.title: Governor Newsom signs Cannabis Trailer Bill, creating the Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: Formation of the Department consolidates three programs into one and advances efforts to streamline the state cannabis regulatory structure.
data.author: Michael Sullivan
